heading: ID
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w/@xml:id, " ")
comment: The identifier given to the work, corresponding to that used in the collection files.

heading: URI (JONAS)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w//tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[normalize-space(tei:title)="JONAS"]/@target, " ")
comment: The URI given to the work within the JONAS database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (Mirabile)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w//tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[normalize-space(tei:title)="Mirabile"]/@target, " ")
comment: The URI given to the work within the Mirabile database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (Pinakes)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w//tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[contains(normalize-space(tei:title),"Pinakes")]/@target, " ")
comment: The URI given to the work within the Pinakes File database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (VIAF)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w//tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[normalize-space(tei:title)="VIAF"]/@target, " ")
comment: The URI given to the work within the Virtual International Authority File database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: other ref(s)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w//tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[not(.//tei:title[normalize-space(.)="JONAS" or normalize-space(.)="Mirabile" or contains(normalize-space(.),"Pinakes") or normalize-space(.)="VIAF"])]/tei:title/string-join(.,""), "; ")
comment: Other references given for the work, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element without a title element corresponding to the databases defined for the preceding columns.

heading: other URI(s)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w//tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[not(.//tei:title[normalize-space(.)="JONAS" or normalize-space(.)="Mirabile" or contains(normalize-space(.),"Pinakes") or normalize-space(.)="VIAF"])]/@target, " ")
comment: Other references given for the work, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element without a title element corresponding to the databases defined for the preceding columns.

heading: uniform
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:title[@type="uniform"]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: The standard title assigned to the work.

heading: variant
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:title[@type="variant"]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: Any variant title(s) assigned to the work.

heading: ms
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:title[@type="ms" or @type="normalised_ms"]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: Any name(s) assigned to the work in manuscript contexts.

heading: normalised
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:title[@type="normalised"]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: Any normalised name(s) assigned to the work.

heading: name
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:author[not(@role="translator")]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: The name(s) given to the author(s) associated with the work, as encoded in an author element.

heading: ID
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join(distinct-values($w/tei:author[not(@role="translator")]/@key), " ")
comment: The identifier(s), corresponding with the persons authority file, given to the author(s) associated with the work.

heading: affiliation
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:author[not(@role="translator")]/tei:affiliation/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: The affiliation of the author(s), if applicable. This column usually contains details of religious orders.

heading: name
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:author[@role="translator"]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: The name(s) given to the translator(s) associated with the work, as encoded in an author element with @type 'translator'.

heading: ID
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join(distinct-values($w/tei:author[@role="translator"]/@key), " ")
comment: The identifier(s), corresponding with the persons authority file, given to the translator(s) associated with the work.

heading: affiliation
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:author[@role="translator"]/tei:affiliation/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: The affiliation of the translator(s), if applicable. This column usually contains details of religious orders.

heading: text lang(s)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w/tei:textLang/string-join(.,""), " ")
comment: The language(s) of the work, as encoded in the textLang element.

heading: main
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w/tei:textLang/@mainLang, " ")
comment: ISO code(s) for the main language of the work, as encoded in the @mainLang attribute to the textLang element.

heading: other
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w/tei:textLang/@otherLangs, " ")
comment: ISO code(s) for additional languages of the work, as encoded in the @otherLangs attribute to the textLang element.

heading: incipit
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:incipit/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: The incipit given to the item in manuscript paratexts, as encoded within an incipit element.

heading: list
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w/tei:term/@ref ! id(substring-after(., "#"))/self::tei:category/tei:catDesc, ", ")
comment: The subjects with which the current work is associated.

heading: URI(s)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w/tei:term/@ref ! id(substring-after(., "#"))/self::tei:category/@source, " ")
comment: URIs linking to details of the definitions of the subjects with which the current work is associated.

heading: theology
xpath:
for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return boolean($w/tei:term/@ref/translate(., "#", "") =  $w/ancestor::tei:TEI/tei:teiHeader/tei:encodingDesc/tei:classDecl/tei:taxonomy/tei:category[@xml:id and tei:catDesc = "theology"]/@xml:id
)
comment: A boolean (true/false) value expressing whether the current work is classed as belonging to the subject topic 'theology'.

xpath:
for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return boolean($w/tei:term/@ref/translate(., "#", "") =  $w/ancestor::tei:TEI/tei:teiHeader/tei:encodingDesc/tei:classDecl/tei:taxonomy/tei:category[@xml:id and tei:catDesc = "documents"]/@xml:id
)
comment: A boolean (true/false) value expressing whether the current work is classed as belonging to the subject topic 'documents'.

)
comment: A boolean (true/false) value expressing whether the current work is classed as belonging to the subject topic 'recreation'.

heading: repertory/ies
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:bibl[@type="repertory"]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: Bibliographic references associated with this item, as encoded within bibl elements, which are classed as repertories using a @type attribute containing 'repertory'.

heading: repertory URI(s)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w/tei:bibl[@type="repertory"]/tei:ref/@target, " ")
comment: The URI(s) associated with any repertories themselves associated with this work.

heading: edition(s)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:bibl[@type="edition"]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: Bibliographic references associated with this work, as encoded within bibl elements, which are classed as editions using a @type attribute containing 'edition'.

heading: edition URI(s)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return string-join($w/tei:bibl[@type="edition"]/tei:ref/@target, " ")
comment: The URI(s) associated with any editions themselves associated with this work.

heading: other bibl(s)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:bibl[not(@type)]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: Other bibliographic references associated with this work, as encoded within bibl elements.

heading: note(s)
xpath: for $w in (//tei:bibl[@xml:id]) return normalize-space(string-join($w/tei:note[not(@type)]/string-join(., ""), "; "))
comment: Notes about the work, as given within a child note element to the place element.
